reviews.review_msg: I seriously and sincerely hope that Dr. Lechner is teaching towards the goal of high student grades. Teachers at SFU forget that grades are the main reported outcome in educational institutions . This is to ensure that teachers are working towards ALL students getting a high grade in their class, instead of a predetermined percentage e.g. 8% A+s.
he's amazing, he's so kind and if u read the notes ur gonna be ok,
